title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 501.3 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 501.3 - Location

State Regulations

Records maintained at the Albany office shall be available
for public inspection and copying at: 17 Columbia Circle

Albany, New York; and records maintained at the West Valley office shall be
available for public inspection and copying at: 9030 Route 219

West Valley, New York 14171

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
501.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
